Write-Up Text: The night before the release of the much anticipated 2023 Australian Federal Budget people took to social media to express their concerns hopes and predictions. Some expressed disappointment towards the Labor government's ability to manage the economy while others criticized the government's policy choices such as stage three tax cuts. However some remained optimistic eager to explore the potential financial relief for those struggling with the cost of living. People in the health industry hoped for prioritized support and funding while others tuned in to financial experts' podcasts to gain a deeper understanding of the government's plans.
